  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">We are proud to support <a href="/hashtag/AutismAwarenessWeek?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>AutismAwarenessWeek</b></a>.

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Good to see how successful the exercise classes organised by the Rainbow Group at Margaret Alexander Centre <a href="/hashtag/Barry?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Barry</b></a>  have become. The Rainbow Group is for ethnic minority women in the Vale, &amp; the classes encourage women who are isolated &amp; want to lead a more active lifestyle.<a href="https://t.co/Ttr2ZP6CxK" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Ttr2ZP6CxK</a></p>
</div>

    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">At the Waspi demonstration in Cardiff today. This is such an injustice for women whove worked all their lives and have had their retirement plans disrupted. We seem to have gone backwards so its only right we highlight this campaign today on International Womens Day <a href="/hashtag/IWD2018?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>IWD2018</b></a><a href="https://t.co/gtMaq4g6xr" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/gtMaq4g6xr</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">So true! 37.6 million of us tuned in to <a href="/hashtag/BluePlanet2?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BluePlanet2</b></a> -what an impact we could make if we all changed our daily habits and encouraged our friends and families too <a href="/hashtag/reduce?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>reduce</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/reuse?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>reuse</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/recycle?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>recycle</b></a><a href="https://t.co/bNXGERtewe" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bbcpress/status/963677027294466049" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bbcpress/status/963677027294466049"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bbcpress/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/963677027294466049</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Brian Cox Retweeted chrislintott</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">My view is that there may be very few civilisations per galaxy at any given time - we may be alone in the Milky Way. Which means we carry quite a weight of responsibility not to mess it up squabbling amongst ourselves.<a href="https://t.co/y1LNIf5kmP" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/chrislintott/status/961997124371189760" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/chrislintott/status/961997124371189760"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/chrislintott/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/961997124371189760</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Brian Cox added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

      <div class="tweet-content">

  </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="/hashtag/100years?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>100years</b></a> ago in the UK, certain women became eligible to vote, &amp; women were given the right to stand for Parliament. Amidst the celebrations, let's not forget those women that were excluded from voting for another ten years, &amp; the women still denied a political voice even today.</p>

  </div>
</div>

</li>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="954370310182195200" id="stream-item-tweet-954370310182195200" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;954370310182195200&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="954370310182195200" data-item-id="954370310182195200" data-permalink-path="/CamillaBeaven/status/954370310182195200" data-conversation-id="954370310182195200" data-tweet-nonce="954370310182195200-c0547b54-c648-48d9-8e2b-07752753d0d3" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="CamillaBeaven" data-name="Camilla Beaven" data-user-id="859521276330823682" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="HarrietHarman" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;859521276330823682&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;CamillaBeaven&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;19977759&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;HarrietHarman&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Harriet Harman&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Harriet Harman&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Harriet Harman&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Camilla Beaven Retweeted Harriet Harman</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Credit to <a href="/HarrietHarman" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="19977759"><s>@</s><b>HarrietHarman</b></a> for insisting that companies publish their gender pay gap rather than just conduct internal audits<a href="https://t.co/zoHNoB9M5p" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/HarrietHarman/status/951902033111650315" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/HarrietHarman/status/951902033111650315"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/HarrietHarman/</span><span class="invisible">status/951902033111650315</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Camilla Beaven added,</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">One of the awful things about losing Jo is knowing how much difference she would have made in the world. When the kids wake up this morning Im going to tell them how - even though shes not here - shes still making the world a better place.<a href="https://t.co/qqe4lSjy5g" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-42708507" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-42708507"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">bbc.co.uk/news/uk-427085</span><span class="invisible">07</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

</li>

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Camilla Beaven Retweeted J.K. Rowling</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Easy to forget amid all the festivities that Christmas can also be a lonely time-this is a wonderful initiative helping to reach out and connect.<a href="https://t.co/zL3ZlpCEiq" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jk_rowling/status/944012850330329088" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jk_rowling/status/944012850330329088"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jk_rowling/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/944012850330329088</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Camilla Beaven added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/jk_rowling/status/944012850330329088" data-conversation-id="944012850330329088" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="944012850330329088" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="jk_rowling" data-user-id="62513246" href="/jk_rowling/status/944012850330329088" data-conversation-id="944012850330329088" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

  </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I have written to <a href="/NatWestBank" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14383940"><s>@</s><b>NatWestBank</b></a> expressing deep disappointment at their decision to close Cowbridge branch-having campaigned against bank closures in Llantwit Major and Dinas Powys, I am dismayed at yet another loss of bank facilities in <a href="/hashtag/ValeofGlamorgan?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ValeofGlamorgan</b></a> &amp; urge them to reconsider<a href="https://t.co/ABjbmlw16B" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/ABjbmlw16B</a></p>

Surely we have a responsibility to care for our blue planet.' - Sir David Attenborough
<a href="/hashtag/BluePlanet2?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BluePlanet2</b></a><a href="https://t.co/x0egn2gVhk" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/x0egn2gVhk</a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="939980713813823489" data-item-id="939980713813823489" data-permalink-path="/CamillaBeaven/status/939980713813823489" data-conversation-id="939980713813823489" data-tweet-nonce="939980713813823489-2213d197-38eb-4905-9f4c-e5d7f6ad190f" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="CamillaBeaven" data-name="Camilla Beaven" data-user-id="859521276330823682" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;859521276330823682&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;CamillaBeaven&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">So <a href="/DavidDavisMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2797521996"><s>@</s><b>DavidDavisMP</b></a> has just told the Brexit Select Committee <a href="/CommonsEUexit" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="786130084637790208"><s>@</s><b>CommonsEUexit</b></a> that no impact assessments exist. I repeat. UK Govt has carried out no impact assessments re economic effects of <a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Supporting Barry residents today at the Senedd after my meeting with <a href="/PublicHealthW" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="394581961"><s>@</s><b>PublicHealthW</b></a> Health Wales about <a href="/hashtag/Barryincinerator?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Barryincinerator</b></a><a href="https://t.co/y7VAkZQRkX" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/y7VAkZQRkX</a></p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Camilla Beaven Retweeted Guardian Education</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">As a graduate of the Erasmus scheme, I am a huge supporter. Many benefits can't be quantified- adapting and building confidence, 
experiencing different cultures, sharing ideas and ways of thinking. Invaluable indeed.<a href="https://t.co/c9ro1oHJdE" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/GuardianEdu/status/935048547166121984" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/GuardianEdu/status/935048547166121984"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/GuardianEdu/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/935048547166121984</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Camilla Beaven added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Over the past 7 years, the Tories have:
- Trebled tuition fees
- Scrapped the housing benefit for younger people
- Barred under 25s from the Living Wage
No wonder they don't want 16-18 year olds voting. 
<a href="/hashtag/VotesAt16?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>VotesAt16</b></a></p>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I was at <a href="/walestuc" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="325437440"><s>@</s><b>Walestuc</b></a> launch of report 'Menopause: a workplace issue'- v important issue &amp; this report is ground breaking.<a href="https://t.co/bZkfV9rEuM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/walestuc/status/923570789412212736" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/walestuc/status/923570789412212736"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/walestuc/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/923570789412212736</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Slavery did not end in 19th century. Welcome <a href="/WelshGovernment" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="41874178"><s>@</s><b>WelshGovernment</b></a> appointment Anti Slavery Coordinator
<a href="/hashtag/AntiSlaveryDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>AntiSlaveryDay</b></a><a href="https://t.co/rSF2zlVAPz" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/swpolice/status/920546280329371648" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/swpolice/status/920546280329371648"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/swpolice/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/920546280329371648</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Camilla Beaven added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/guardian" data-user-id="87818409">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/952866338187423744/0hj7a-EH_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">The Guardian</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>guardian</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Research is vital.  It can improve care for people with dementia today and potentially find a cure for tomorrow.  <a href="/hashtag/WorldAlzheimersDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>WorldAlzheimersDay</b></a><a href="https://t.co/ysaThuONgb" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/JaneHutt/status/910795834517807106" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/JaneHutt/status/910795834517807106"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/JaneHutt/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/910795834517807106</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Camilla Beaven added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="909477299694817280" id="stream-item-tweet-909477299694817280" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;909477299694817280&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">
    


  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="909477299694817280" data-item-id="909477299694817280" data-permalink-path="/WelshGovernment/status/909477299694817280" data-conversation-id="909477299694817280" data-tweet-nonce="909477299694817280-8f21b28a-57bc-4cc2-9f3f-3475bc9b4417" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="910253458120470528" data-retweeter="CamillaBeaven" data-screen-name="WelshGovernment" data-name="Welsh Government" data-user-id="41874178" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;41874178&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;WelshGovernment&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Welsh Government&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Welsh Government&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Welsh Government&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;859521276330823682&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;CamillaBeaven&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/JaneHutt" data-user-id="236909222">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/973653429061959681/5fZyEcgU_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">JaneHutt AM</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>JaneHutt</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Our fabulous ValeLabour team with <a href="/JaneHutt" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="236909222"><s>@</s><b>JaneHutt</b></a> &amp; <a href="/CamillaBeaven" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="859521276330823682"><s>@</s><b>CamillaBeaven</b></a> at the <a href="/hashtag/ValeofGlamorganShow?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ValeofGlamorganShow</b></a><a href="https://t.co/jsG9dgFwiv" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/jsG9dgFwiv</a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">V interesting developments re Biomass - thanks to excellent campaigning by <a href="/StopBarryBurnin" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="841986258159206401"><s>@</s><b>StopBarryBurnin</b></a> &amp; support from <a href="/JaneHutt" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="236909222"><s>@</s><b>JaneHutt</b></a><a href="https://t.co/3cknLOlrvI" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/JaneHutt/status/889453594835128320" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/JaneHutt/status/889453594835128320"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/JaneHutt/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/889453594835128320</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Camilla Beaven added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/JaneHutt/status/889453594835128320" data-conversation-id="889453594835128320" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="889453594835128320" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="JaneHutt" data-user-id="236909222" href="/JaneHutt/status/889453594835128320" data-conversation-id="889453594835128320" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton  js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-retweet-count-aria-885121210350264321">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Absolutely bowled over by how talented these students are!<a href="https://t.co/KI737HDpwE" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/LlantwitMajorSc/status/884837417274003457" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/LlantwitMajorSc/status/884837417274003457"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/LlantwitMajorS</span><span class="invisible">c/status/884837417274003457</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

45 times to cut welfare benefits

      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--reply"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Reply</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton  js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-retweet-count-aria-882148158062694400">

  </span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>

  </button>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Jane Hutt supporting the Great Get Together this Saturday - why not drop in? <a href="/hashtag/thegreatgettogether?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>thegreatgettogether</b></a><a href="https://t.co/lU0XUixc2d" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/JaneHutt/status/874926830322634753" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/JaneHutt/status/874926830322634753"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/JaneHutt/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/874926830322634753</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Camilla Beaven added,</p>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="874928375198101504" id="stream-item-tweet-874928375198101504" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;874928375198101504&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Huge thanks to everyone who voted for me and all my supporters <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GE2017</b></span> <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Valeofglamorgan</b></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Z9KAwBC2uj</span></div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton  js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-retweet-count-aria-872869669149044737">

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/CamillaBeaven" data-user-id="859521276330823682">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate ">Camilla Beaven</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>CamillaBeaven</b></span></a>

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/CamillaBeaven" data-user-id="859521276330823682">

        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Camilla Beaven Retweeted Welsh Labour</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">

      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>

  </button>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Camilla Beaven Retweeted Welsh Labour</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="und" data-aria-label-part="4"><a href="/hashtag/GE2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GE2017</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/standingupforwales?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>standingupforwales</b></a><a href="https://t.co/TkkugxM0Iw" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/WelshLabour/status/868179847264305152" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/WelshLabour/status/868179847264305152"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/WelshLabour/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/868179847264305152</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>

  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-868093936346255360">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Conservatives have dropped a pledge to ban ivory trading <a href="https://t.co/IDFA5SDVpA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/conservatives-ivory-trade-ban-2017-manifesto-scrap-pledge-illegal-poaching-a7748581.html?cmpid=facebook-post" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/conservatives-ivory-trade-ban-2017-manifesto-scrap-pledge-illegal-poaching-a7748581.html?cmpid=facebook-post"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">independent.co.uk/news/uk/politi</span><span class="invisible">cs/conservatives-ivory-trade-ban-2017-manifesto-scrap-pledge-illegal-poaching-a7748581.html?cmpid=facebook-post</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a>  <a href="/hashtag/IvoryBan?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>IvoryBan</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/GE2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GE2017</b></a></p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">28</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>

  <ul>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="864579127046791170" id="stream-item-tweet-864579127046791170" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;864579127046791170&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

    </div>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Stonewall Cymru</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>StonewallCymru</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr"><span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GE2017</b></span> is a chance to speak up for LGBT equality.         <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">3</span>

</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--reply">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionReply" data-modal="ProfileTweet-reply" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-reply-count-aria-863023820764045313">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Reply">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--reply"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Reply</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton  js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-retweet-count-aria-863023820764045313">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I'm proud to be <a href="/hashtag/standingupforwales?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>standingupforwales</b></a> in the <a href="/hashtag/ValeofGlamorgan?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ValeofGlamorgan</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/GE2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GE2017</b></a><a href="https://t.co/FRERxx3vQa" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/WelshLabour/status/861955727375683585" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/WelshLabour/status/861955727375683585"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/WelshLabour/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/861955727375683585</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       has-cards  has-content&#10;" data-tweet-id="861691123881914369" data-item-id="861691123881914369" data-permalink-path="/CamillaBeaven/status/861691123881914369" data-conversation-id="861691123881914369" data-tweet-nonce="861691123881914369-3167aef9-8aac-415a-98cd-383fd66e98cf" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="CamillaBeaven" data-name="Camilla Beaven" data-user-id="859521276330823682" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;859521276330823682&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;CamillaBeaven&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Camilla Beaven&quot;}}]" data-possibly-sensitive="true" data-disclosure-type="" data-has-cards="true">

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/CamillaBeaven" data-user-id="859521276330823682">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/920700923336413184/P7DIbngR_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Camilla Beaven</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>CamillaBeaven</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Welsh Labour is energised and ready to take the fight to the Tories. We will take our message out to the people of Wales <a href="/hashtag/StandingUpForWales?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StandingUpForWales</b></a><a href="https://t.co/Rxa0Ld45xj" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/Rxa0Ld45xj</a></p>

      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Great start to <a href="/WelshLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14496224"><s>@</s><b>WelshLabour</b></a> campaign today<a href="https://t.co/GvZL3B7PQq" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/MadeleineMoon/status/861555417373126658" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/MadeleineMoon/status/861555417373126658"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/MadeleineMoon/</span><span class="invisible">status/861555417373126658</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Camilla Beaven added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Madeleine Moon MP</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>MadeleineMoon</b></span>

  <div class="modal modal-small draggable">

      <div class="modal-header">
        <h3 class="modal-title">Go to a person's profile</h3>
      </div>

      <div class="modal-body">

    Learn the latest
  </h3>
